name: TalkSimulator
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: talk sim
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Developing a voice skill has never been easier. Talk Simulator, is a smart way to mockup, test and share your VUI without writing a single line of code. It can help you iterate through your voice scripts to develop the perfect user experience for your voice application. 
This skill interacts with conversations you create on talkSim.com and requires linking to a talk simulator account. 
Talk sim plays back dynamic content. User discretion is advised.
